Articles.Content:
Well i was looking into this game for some time now.

What a better moment to jump on the hype train and buy KSP now that 1.1 has just released?

I've watched many youtube videos, so i should be good for a first run of the game. I would be glad to join the modding community(I'm a developer irl) when i'm more familiar with the mechanics of this game.

Welcome!

It's great to have another member of the community.

Hello RattiRotto and welcome to the forum!

You have indeed joined at a very auspicious moment with 1.1 just released.  Glad to have you aboard.

Happy landings!

Thanks for the welcome! 

The application of the knowledge gained from 30+ videos resulted in many great unexpected explosion effects. It's kind of the trailer of this game.

I'm definitely heading over the tutorial section of the forum!

14 hours ago, RattiRatto said:

Well i was looking into this game for some time now.

What a better moment to jump on the hype train and buy KSP now that 1.1 has just released?

I've watched many youtube videos, so i should be good for a first run of the game. I would be glad to join the modding community(I'm a developer irl) when i'm more familiar with the mechanics of this game.

 

Every version has been joyful... from those in which you did not have reentry effects to those in which aerodynamic effects didn't flip you rocket when you weren't looking (costing you a lot of money)... Enjoy the game, the guys from Squad have been doing a great job.

Ahhh... the young people these days who won't have to deal with a launch tower that would clip into large rockets.....

Welcome to the KSP forums!
